// ConcatenateField component - Handles concatenate transformation fields
import React from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ConcatenateField=_ref=>{let{mapping,updateMapping,sourceFields}=_ref;const toggleField=fieldName=>{const fields=[...(mapping.concatenateFields||[])];const index=fields.indexOf(fieldName);if(index>-1){fields.splice(index,1);}else{fields.push(fieldName);}updateMapping({concatenateFields:fields});};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"form-group",style:{gridColumn:'1 / -1',marginTop:'8px'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:"Source Fields (Select multiple) *"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{style:{display:'flex',flexWrap:'wrap',gap:'8px',marginTop:'4px'},children:sourceFields.map(field=>{const isSelected=(mapping.concatenateFields||[]).includes(field.name);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("label",{style:{display:'flex',alignItems:'center',gap:'4px',fontSize:'12px',cursor:'pointer',padding:'4px 8px',backgroundColor:isSelected?'#dbeafe':'#f3f4f6',borderRadius:'4px',border:"1px solid ".concat(isSelected?'#3b82f6':'#e5e7eb')},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"checkbox",checked:isSelected,onChange:()=>toggleField(field.name)}),field.label]},field.name);})}),(mapping.concatenateFields||[]).length>0&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{marginTop:'12px'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{style:{fontSize:'12px',display:'block',marginBottom:'4px',fontWeight:'500'},children:"Separator *"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",value:mapping.separator||' ',onChange:e=>updateMapping({separator:e.target.value}),placeholder:"Enter separator (e.g., space, comma, dash)",style:{fontSize:'12px',padding:'6px 10px',height:'32px',width:'100%',maxWidth:'300px',border:'1px solid #d1d5db',borderRadius:'4px',backgroundColor:'#fff'}})]})]});};export default ConcatenateField;
